page.title: 12Population of Ripe
page.content: Ripe and the surrounding area has a mixed population of about 300 adults and 40 children. There are more young people moving into the area now. Some houseowners commute to London and some work locally. In such a small village it is easy to get to know people and the quality of life is high. Out of 300 adults about 50 are over the age of 60. When seeking a retirement home the village is a good choice as it is level, has its own shops and is a pleasant place to live. Children are also well catered for as there is a primary school in the next village, a comprehensive school in Ringmer and a choice of play groups for the toddlers. For the middle group there are good reasons to live in Ripe as was said before.
